page.title: 19PETER BUCHAN-BIOGRAPHY
page.content: Our group decided to interview a local character so we chose Peter Buchan the poet.Peter has always lived in Peterhead and over the years has written many poems about fishing.Peter Buchan attended Peterhead Academy and he left school with 6 Highers.Even though he did very well at school Peter thinks he would have been more successful if he had studied more.After he left school,Peter started fishing.His first boat was the "Sparkling Star."Peter started writing poems when he was 30.He says he gets his inspiration from thinking about past days and also if someone makes a chance remark.Once he makes a start to a poem he writes it very quickly.He has written a book of poetry called "Mount Pleasant."Peter Buchan writes his poems for fun and as a hobby.
